title: LP gains and ranked system
body: Does anyone know how the ranked system actually works because according to my mmr i am higher then average but i am still only getting 17-19 LP per win and losing 20 per loss if anyone knows exactly for the mmr lp gain system works i would like a detailed reply

replies.body: To add to what Porocles said, the 3rd party sites' MMR's are based off of how other people in your "league" (Kayle's Vindicators/Karma's Adjudicators etc.) are doing.  You could literally not play any games and if they are all mostly wining their games it'll say your MMR went down or is below average (it didn't actually move) and if they lose a bunch it'll say your MMR is higher than average.

MMR is a hidden value, so if you're getting results from third party sites they may be inaccurate but your placement in ranked is a solid indicator.  Per the [Matchmaking Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752954-Matchmaking-Guide), LP is based on a few factors like if matchmaking thinks you're going to win or lose a match.  You might be at a point where matchmaking believes you're in a solid place, so you may have to work a bit harder towards proving the system otherwise.  Hope that helps clear things up, and good luck!
